gc_integrate.F90

00001 module gc_integrate
00002 
00003 contains
00004     function dlg_gc_velocity ( pos, vPerp, vPar, NFO )
00005         use gc_terms
00006         use interp
00007         use eqdsk
00008         implicit none
00009 
00010         real :: dlg_gc_velocity(3)
00011         real, intent(IN) :: pos(3), vPerp, vPar
00012         real :: grad_R, grad_phi, grad_z, 
00013             curv_R, curv_phi, curv_z, 
00014             unitb_R, unitb_phi, unitb_z
00015         real :: surf2, bMagHere, bHere(3), 
00016             vgc_R, vgc_phi, vgc_z
00017         integer, optional, intent(in) :: NFO
00018 
00019         grad_R  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00020             bGradient_R, nw, zp_bGrad_R, sigma )
00021         grad_phi  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00022             bGradient_phi, nw, zp_bGrad_phi, sigma )
00023         grad_z  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00024             bGradient_z, nw, zp_bGrad_z, sigma )
00025 
00026         curv_R  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00027             bCurvature_R, nw, zp_bCurv_R, sigma )
00028         curv_phi  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00029             bCurvature_phi, nw, zp_bCurv_phi, sigma )
00030         curv_z  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00031             bCurvature_z, nw, zp_bCurv_z, sigma )
00032 
00033         bHere   = dlg_interpB ( pos, bMagHere = bMagHere )
00034         unitb_R = bHere(1) / bMagHere
00035         unitb_phi   = bHere(2) / bMagHere
00036         unitb_z = bHere(3) / bMagHere
00037 
00038         if ( present ( NFO ) ) then
00039  
00040             vgc_R   = vPar * unitb_R 
00041             vgc_phi   = vPar * unitb_phi 
00042             vgc_z   = vPar * unitb_z 
00043 
00044         else
00045             
00046             vgc_R   = vPar * unitb_R + vPerp**2 * grad_R + vPar**2 * curv_R 
00047             vgc_phi   = vPar * unitb_phi + vPerp**2 * grad_phi + vPar**2 * curv_phi
00048             vgc_z   = vPar * unitb_z + vPerp**2 * grad_z + vPar**2 * curv_z
00049 
00050         endif
00051 
00052         dlg_gc_velocity = (/ vgc_R, vgc_phi, vgc_z /)
00053 
00054     end function dlg_gc_velocity
00055 
00056     function dlg_vPerp ( pos, u )
00057         use constants
00058         implicit none
00059 
00060         real :: bHere(3),bMagHere
00061         real, intent(IN) :: pos(3), u
00062         real :: dlg_vPerp
00063 
00064         bHere   = dlg_interpB ( pos, bMagHere = bMagHere )
00065         dlg_vPerp   = sqrt ( 2.0 * u * bMagHere / mi )
00066 
00067     end function dlg_vPerp
00068 
00069     function dlg_vPar ( pos, u )
00070         use constants
00071         use gc_terms
00072         use interp
00073         use eqdsk
00074         implicit none
00075         
00076         real :: dlg_vPar, bDotGradB_here, surf2
00077         real, intent(IN) :: pos(3), u
00078 
00079         bDotGradB_here  = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00080             bDotGradB, nw, zp_bDotGradB, sigma )
00081 
00082         dlg_vPar    = -u / mi * bDotGradB_here 
00083 
00084     end function dlg_vPar
00085 
00086     function dlg_interpB ( pos, bMagHere )
00087         use eqdsk
00088         use interp
00089         implicit none
00090         
00091         real :: bR_here, bPhi_here, bz_here
00092         real, intent(IN) :: pos(3)
00093         real :: dlg_interpB(3)
00094         real, optional, intent(OUT) :: bMagHere
00095         real :: surf2
00096 
00097         bR_here = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00098             bR, nw, zp_bR, sigma )
00099         bPhi_here = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00100             bPhi, nw, zp_bPhi, sigma )
00101         bz_here = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00102             bz, nw, zp_bz, sigma )
00103 
00104         if ( present (bMagHere) ) &
00105             bMagHere    = sqrt ( bR_here**2 + bPhi_here**2 + bz_here**2 )
00106 
00107         dlg_interpB(1)  = bR_here 
00108         dlg_interpB(2)  = bPhi_here
00109         dlg_interpB(3)  = bz_here 
00110     
00111     end function dlg_interpB
00112 
00113     subroutine gc_orbit ( start_R, start_z, start_vPerp, &
00114          start_vPar, weight, plot )
00115         use eqdsk
00116         use gc_terms
00117         use constants
00118 
00119 #if USE_DISLIN
00120         use dislin 
00121 #endif
00122 
00123         use interp
00124         use rzvv_grid
00125         use init_mpi
00126         use read_namelist
00127         implicit none
00128        
00129         integer, parameter :: dbl = selected_real_kind ( p=13, r = 200 ) 
00130         real, intent(IN) :: start_R, start_z,
00131             start_vPerp, start_vPar, 
00132             weight
00133         real :: weightMod
00134         integer(kind=LONG), parameter :: maxSteps = 5000
00135         integer :: stepCnt, var_dt, i, j, ii
00136         real, dimension (maxSteps) :: rTrack, zTrack, 
00137             vPerpTrack, vParTrack, distance, dtArray, 
00138             R_index, z_index, 
00139             vPerp_index, vPar_index, 
00140             rTrack_nfo, zTrack_nfo, vPerpTrack_nfo, 
00141             vParTrack_nfo
00142         real :: tau, dTau, pos(3), 
00143             u, bMagHere, bHere(3), vPerp, vPar, 
00144             vgc(3), vPerp_n, vPar_n
00145         real(kind=dbl) :: dt, dtMin, dtMax
00146         logical :: stillIn, firstOrbit
00147         logical, optional, intent(IN) :: plot
00148         real :: k1_vPar, k1_vgc(3), k2_vPar, k2_vgc(3), 
00149             k3_vPar, k3_vgc(3), k4_vPar, k4_vgc(3), lastStep, 
00150             psi_here, surf2, vgc_n(3), k1_vgc_n(3), k2_vgc_n(3), 
00151             k3_vgc_n(3), k4_vgc_n(3), pos_(3), k1_vPar_n, 
00152             k2_vPar_n, k3_vPar_n, k4_vPar_n
00153         
00154         integer, dimension (maxSteps) :: vPerp_start, vPerp_stop, 
00155             vPar_start, vPar_stop, R_start, R_stop, 
00156             z_start, z_stop
00157         !integer :: sR
00158         
00159         real :: f_rzvv_update(vPerp_nBins,vPar_nBins)
00160         real :: f_rzvv_update2(vPerp_nBins,vPar_nBins)
00161         real :: dV(vPerp_nBins,vPar_nBins), dV_
00162 
00163         real :: v_sigma
00164         real :: normFac, normFac_, bArg
00165         real(kind=dbl) :: bessi, bF, result_D, expTerm_D 
00166 
00167         !   if you change this you need to alter
00168         !   the initialisation of phi down further
00169         integer, parameter :: nPhi = 21         
00170         
00171         real :: phi(nPhi), phiBase(nPhi)
00172         real :: phiRange, phi0, vX(nPhi), vY(nPhi), 
00173             vZ(nPhi), vX0, vY0, vz0
00174 
00175         real :: theta, start_theta, theta_old, 
00176             theta_diff, theta_diff_old
00177         logical :: nearStart, skip_dtUpdate
00178         real :: EStep
00179         integer :: stride
00180        
00181 #if USE_DISLIN
00182  
00183         !   Plotting variables
00184     
00185         integer :: nLevs, nxPag, nyPag
00186         real :: levStep
00187         real, allocatable :: levels(:)
00188 
00189 #endif
00190         
00191         !   Initialize variables
00192       
00193         stepCnt = 0
00194         firstOrbit  = .true.
00195         stillIn = .true.
00196         dTau    = 0.0
00197         tau = 0.0
00198         var_dt  = 1
00199         skip_dtUpdate   = .false.
00200 
00201         weightMod   = weight
00202         if ( weight > weightLimit ) then
00203             nP_badWeight = nP_badWeight + 1
00204             weightMod = 0.0
00205         endif
00206 
00207         if ( noAveraging ) then
00208 
00209             NFO = .false.
00210             firstOrbit = .false.
00211             rTrack(1) = start_R
00212             zTrack(1) = start_z
00213             vPerpTrack(1) = start_vPerp
00214             vParTrack(1) = start_vPar
00215             tau    = 1.0
00216             dtArray(1)  = 1.0
00217             stepCnt = 1
00218             go to 11 ! yes, i know, shutUp ;-)
00219 
00220         end if
00221 
00222         !! Interpolation testing variables
00223 
00224         !real, allocatable :: bR_interp(:,:)
00225         !real :: b_interp(3)
00226         !integer :: j
00227 
00228 10      continue
00229 
00230         pos(1)  = start_R
00231         pos(2)  = 0.0
00232         pos(3)  = start_z
00233 
00234         start_theta = aTan2 ( start_z - zmAxis, start_R -rmAxis ) * 180.0 / pi
00235 
00236         vPerp   = start_vPerp
00237         vPar    = start_vPar
00238         
00239         if ( NFO ) then 
00240 
00241             pos_    = pos
00242             vPar_n  = vPar
00243             vPerp_n = vPerp
00244 
00245         endif
00246 
00247         bHere   = dlg_interpB ( pos, bMagHere = bMagHere )
00248 
00249         u   = mi * vPerp**2 / ( 2.0 * bMagHere ) 
00250 
00251         dtMin   = 1.0e-9
00252         if ( var_dt == 1 ) then
00253             dtMax   = 5.0e-6
00254         else 
00255             dtMin   = 0.0005e-7
00256             dtMax   = 0.05e-7
00257         end if
00258         
00259         dt  = dtMin
00260 
00261         !!   Test the surf1/2 interpolations
00262 
00263         !allocate ( bR_interp(nw,nh) )
00264         !do i=1,nw
00265         !    do j=1,nh
00266         !        b_interp    = dlg_interpB ( (/ r(i), 0.0, z(j) /) )
00267         !        bR_interp(i,j)  = b_interp(1)
00268         !    end do
00269         !end do
00270 
00271 #if USE_DISLIN
00272 
00273         if ( present ( plot ) .and. mpi_pId == 0 ) then 
00274             if ( plot ) then  
00275             
00276                 call scrMod ( 'REVERS' )
00277                 call setPag ( 'DA4P' )! nxPag = 2100, nyPag = 2970
00278                 call metaFl ( 'XWIN' )
00279                 call disIni ()
00280                 call winMod ( 'NONE' )
00281                 call erase ()
00282                 call noChek ()
00283                 call unit ( 0 )
00284                 call getPag ( nxPag, nyPag )
00285                 call axsPos ( 300, 1700 )
00286                 call axsLen ( 1500, 1400 )
00287                 call graf ( 0.5, 1.0, 0.5, 0.25, -0.25, 0.25, -0.25, 0.25 ) 
00288                 call noClip ()
00289                 call color ('BLUE')         
00290                 
00291                 nLevs   = 10 
00292                 levStep    = (sibry-simag)/nLevs 
00293                 if ( .not. allocated ( levels ) ) &
00294                     allocate ( levels(nLevs) )
00295                 levels = (/ (i*levStep,i=0,nLevs) /)+simag
00296                 do i=1,nLevs
00297                     call contur ( r, nw, z, nh, psizr, levels(i) ) 
00298                 end do
00299                 call color ( 'MAGENTA' )
00300                 call curve ( rbbbs, zbbbs, nbbbs )
00301 
00302                 call endGrf ()
00303                 call color ('RED' )
00304                 !call setGrf ( 'NONE', 'NONE', 'NONE', 'NONE' ) 
00305 
00306             end if 
00307         end if 
00308 #endif
00309 
00310         do 
00311   
00312             ! Include finite orbits
00313 
00314 12          continue
00315  
00316             if ( dt < dtMin ) dt = dtMin
00317             if ( dt > dtMax ) dt = dtMax
00318  
00319             vPerp   = dlg_vPerp ( pos, u ) 
00320             vgc = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos, vPerp, vPar )
00321             k1_vPar   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos, u ) 
00322             k1_vgc  = dt * vgc
00323             
00324             vPerp   = dlg_vPerp ( pos + k1_vgc / 2.0, u ) 
00325             vgc = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos + k1_vgc / 2.0, vPerp, vPar + k1_vPar / 2.0 )
00326             k2_vPar   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos + k1_vgc / 2.0, u ) 
00327             k2_vgc  = dt * vgc
00328            
00329             vPerp   = dlg_vPerp ( pos + k2_vgc / 2.0, u ) 
00330             vgc = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos + k2_vgc / 2.0, vPerp, vPar + k2_vPar / 2.0 )
00331             k3_vPar   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos + k2_vgc / 2.0, u ) 
00332             k3_vgc  = dt * vgc
00333             
00334             vPerp   = dlg_vPerp ( pos + k3_vgc, u ) 
00335             vgc = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos + k3_vgc, vPerp, vPar + k3_vPar )
00336             k4_vPar   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos + k3_vgc, u ) 
00337             k4_vgc  = dt * vgc
00338            
00339             vPar    = vPar + ( k1_vPar + 2.0 * k2_vPar + 2.0 * k3_vPar &
00340                 + k4_vPar ) / 6.0
00341            
00342             pos   = pos + ( k1_vgc + 2.0 * k2_vgc + 2.0 * k3_vgc + k4_vgc ) / 6.0
00343 
00344             if ( NFO ) then
00345            
00346             ! No finite orbits 
00347  
00348             vPerp_n   = dlg_vPerp ( pos_, u ) 
00349             vgc_n = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos_, vPerp_n, vPar_n, NFO = 1 )
00350             k1_vPar_n   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos_, u ) 
00351             k1_vgc_n  = dt * vgc_n
00352             
00353             vPerp_n   = dlg_vPerp ( pos_ + k1_vgc_n / 2.0, u ) 
00354             vgc_n = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos_ + k1_vgc_n / 2.0, vPerp_n, vPar_n + k1_vPar_n / 2.0, NFO = 1 )
00355             k2_vPar_n   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos_ + k1_vgc_n / 2.0, u ) 
00356             k2_vgc_n  = dt * vgc_n
00357            
00358             vPerp_n   = dlg_vPerp ( pos_ + k2_vgc_n / 2.0, u ) 
00359             vgc_n = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos_ + k2_vgc_n / 2.0, vPerp_n, vPar_n + k2_vPar_n / 2.0, NFO = 1 )
00360             k3_vPar_n   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos_ + k2_vgc_n / 2.0, u ) 
00361             k3_vgc_n  = dt * vgc_n
00362             
00363             vPerp_n   = dlg_vPerp ( pos_ + k3_vgc_n, u ) 
00364             vgc_n = dlg_gc_velocity ( pos_ + k3_vgc_n, vPerp_n, vPar_n + k3_vPar_n, NFO = 1 )
00365             k4_vPar_n   = dt * dlg_vPar ( pos_ + k3_vgc_n, u ) 
00366             k4_vgc_n  = dt * vgc_n
00367            
00368             vPar_n    = vPar_n + ( k1_vPar_n + 2.0 * k2_vPar_n + 2.0 * k3_vPar_n &
00369                 + k4_vPar_n ) / 6.0
00370            
00371             pos_   = pos_ + ( k1_vgc_n + 2.0 * k2_vgc_n + 2.0 * k3_vgc_n + k4_vgc_n ) / 6.0
00372 
00373             endif
00374             
00375             !   Interpolate to get psi at new pos
00376             !   and if psi(pos) is outside the last 
00377             !   closed flux surface then dump the particle
00378             !   The 0.98 is a factor suggested by EFJ to keep
00379             !   away boundary of the flux grid.
00380 
00381             psi_here = surf2 ( pos(1), pos(3), nw, nh, r, z, &
00382                 psizr, nw, zp_psi, sigma )
00383 
00384             if ( psi_here > sibry * 0.99 ) stillIn = .false.
00385 
00386             if ( (.not. stillIn) .or. (.not. firstOrbit) .or. stepCnt >= maxSteps ) then
00387 
00388                 if ( stepCnt+1 >= maxSteps ) then
00389                     if ( var_dt == 1 ) then 
00390                         
00391                         !   The algorithm seems to trace the particles well,
00392                         !   including finding the orbit end points. Howevere,
00393                         !   there seem to be two exceptions that I have found so
00394                         !   far, these being particles whose orbits track very
00395                         !   near the plasma boundary and those that are on the
00396                         !   trapped passing boundary. Reducing the step size
00397                         !   does not seem to fix the trajectories near the
00398                         !   plasma boundary while the trapped/passing boundary
00399                         !   orbits are rare.
00400                            
00401                         !write(*,*) 'Suspected bad trace [long], adjusting dt range'
00402                         stepCnt = 0
00403                         var_dt = 0
00404                         !if ( present ( plot ) ) then
00405                         !    if ( plot ) call disFin ()
00406                         !endif
00407                         go to 10 
00408                     else
00409                         !write(*,*) 'Finer dt did not help'
00410                         nP_bad  = nP_bad + 1
00411                     end if
00412                 end if
00413                 
00414                 if ( .not. stillIn ) nP_wall = nP_wall + 1
00415 
00416                 exit
00417 
00418             end if
00419 
00420             stepCnt = stepCnt + 1
00421 
00422             rTrack(stepCnt) = pos(1)
00423             zTrack(stepCnt) = pos(3)
00424             vPerpTrack(stepCnt) = vPerp
00425             vParTrack(stepCnt)  = vPar
00426 
00427             if ( NFO ) then 
00428                 rTrack_nfo(stepCnt) = pos_(1)
00429                 zTrack_nfo(stepCnt) = pos_(3)
00430                 vPerpTrack_nfo(stepCnt) = vPerp_n
00431                 vParTrack_nfo(stepCnt)  = vPar_n
00432             endif
00433 
00434             tau = tau + dt
00435             dtArray(stepCnt)    = dt
00436           
00437             if ( NFO ) then  
00438         
00439                 distance(stepCnt)   = sqrt ( ( start_R - pos_(1) )**2 &
00440                     + ( start_z - pos_(3) )**2 )
00441             else
00442 
00443                  distance(stepCnt)   = sqrt ( ( start_R - pos(1) )**2 &
00444                     + ( start_z - pos(3) )**2 )
00445 
00446             endif
00447             
00448             !   Detect end of orbit
00449 
00450             theta_old   = theta
00451             theta   = aTan2 ( zTrack(stepCnt) - zmAxis, rTrack(stepCnt) -rmAxis ) * 180.0 / pi &
00452                 - start_theta
00453             if ( theta < 0 ) theta = theta + 360.0
00454             
00455             if ( stepCnt > 20 ) then
00456 
00457                 if ( NFO ) then
00458        
00459                     ! NFO end of orbit is small distance plus same sign
00460                     ! of vPar as starting vPar.
00461                      
00462                     if ( distance(stepCnt-1) < 0.0006 &
00463                         .and. vPar_n / start_vPar > 0 ) firstOrbit = .false.
00464  
00465                 else
00466 
00467                     !   New end of orbit check
00468 
00469                     theta_diff_old  = theta_diff
00470                     theta_diff  = theta_old - theta
00471                     nearStart = .false.
00472                     if ( theta < 2.5 .or. theta > 357.5 ) nearStart = .true.
00473                     if ( vParTrack(stepCnt) / start_vPar > 0 .and. &
00474                         start_vPar / abs ( start_vPar ) * theta_diff > 0 .and. &
00475                         sin ( theta * pi / 180.0 ) < 0.045 .and. nearStart ) &
00476                             firstOrbit = .false.  
00477 
00478                     !   Old end of orbit check
00479 
00480                     !if ( ( distance(stepCnt) - distance(stepCnt-1) ) > 0 .AND. &
00481                     !    ( distance(stepCnt-1) - distance(stepCnt-2) ) < 0 .AND. &
00482                     !    distance(stepCnt-1) < 0.0006  ) firstOrbit = .false.
00483             
00484                 endif
00485 
00486             end if
00487 
00488             if ( firstOrbit .and. stepCnt > 1 ) then 
00489 
00490                 !   Adjust time step 
00491 
00492                 if ( NFO ) then 
00493 
00494                     lastStep    = sqrt ( ( rTrack_nfo(stepCnt) - rTrack_nfo(stepCnt-1) )**2 &
00495                         + ( zTrack_nfo(stepCnt) - zTrack_nfo(stepCnt-1) )**2 )
00496                 else
00497 
00498                     lastStep    = sqrt ( ( rTrack(stepCnt) - rTrack(stepCnt-1) )**2 &
00499                     + ( zTrack(stepCnt) - zTrack(stepCnt-1) )**2 )
00500 
00501                 endif
00502 
00503                 !if ( distance(stepCnt) > 0.1 ) then
00504 
00505                 if ( lastStep .eq. lastStep .and. lastStep > 0 .and. &
00506                         ( .not. skip_dtUpdate ) ) &
00507                     dt  = traceStepLength / lastStep * dt
00508 
00509                 !skip_dtUpdate   = .false.
00510 
00511                     !   Prevent dt from increasing faster than 10% per
00512                     !   step.
00513 
00514                     !if ( ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / dtArray(stepCnt) > 0.1) &
00515                     !    dt = dtArray(stepCnt) &
00516                     !        + ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / abs ( dtArray(stepCnt) - dt ) &
00517                     !        * dtArray(stepCnt)*0.1
00518            
00519                 !else
00520    
00521                 !    if ( distance(stepCnt) > 0.01 ) then
00522 
00523                 !        dt = 0.01 / lastStep * dt
00524 
00525                 !        if ( ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / dtArray(stepCnt) > 0.1) &
00526                 !        dt = dtArray(stepCnt) &
00527                 !            + ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / abs ( dtArray(stepCnt) - dt ) &
00528                 !            * dtArray(stepCnt)*0.1
00529                 !    else
00530 
00531                 !        dt = 0.01 / lastStep * dt
00532 
00533                 !        if ( ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / dtArray(stepCnt) > 0.1) &
00534                 !        dt = dtArray(stepCnt) &
00535                 !            + ( dt - dtArray(stepCnt) ) / abs ( dtArray(stepCnt) - dt ) &
00536                 !            * dtArray(stepCnt)*0.1
00537  
00538                 !    end if
00539  
00540                 !end if
00541                
00542                 !if ( vPerp < vPerp_range * 0.1 ) dt = dtMin
00543  
00544                 !if ( mpi_pId == 0 ) write(*,*) mpi_pId, dt
00545 
00546             !if ( stepCnt > 1 ) then 
00547 
00548             !    EStep = abs ( ( vPerpTrack(stepCnt)**2 + vParTrack(stepCnt)**2 ) &
00549             !        -  ( vPerpTrack(stepCnt-1)**2 + vParTrack(stepCnt-1)**2 ) ) &
00550             !        / ( vPerpTrack(stepCnt-1)**2 + vParTrack(stepCnt-1)**2 )
00551  
00552             !    if ( EStep > 0.1e-2 .and. dt*0.5 > dtMin ) then ! do over ;-)
00553        
00554             !        if ( mpi_pId == 0 ) write (*,'(e8.2,3x,i3,3x,e8.2)') dt, stepCnt, eStep
00555             !        tau = tau - dt 
00556             !        dt = dt * 0.5
00557             !        vPerp   = vPerpTrack(stepCnt-1)
00558             !        vPar   = vParTrack(stepCnt-1)
00559             !        pos(1)   = rTrack(stepCnt-1)
00560             !        pos(3)   = zTrack(stepCnt-1)
00561             !        skip_dtUpdate   = .true.
00562 
00563             !        stepCnt = stepCnt - 1
00564 
00565             !        !write (*,*) 'DO-OVER', dt
00566 
00567             !        goto 12
00568 
00569             !    endif 
00570 
00571             !    !if ( EStep < 0.1e-6 ) dt = dt * 1.2
00572 
00573             !endif 
00574 
00575             end if 
00576 
00577 
00578 #if USE_DISLIN
00579            
00580             !   Plot track
00581 
00582             if ( present ( plot ) .and. mpi_pId == 0 ) then
00583                 if ( plot ) then  
00584 
00585                     if ( stepCnt > 2 ) then
00586 
00587                         call axsPos ( 300, 1700 )
00588                         call axsLen ( 1500, 1400 )
00589                         call color ( 'WHITE' )
00590                         call graf ( 0.5, 1.0, 0.5, 0.25, -0.25, 0.25, -0.25, 0.25 ) 
00591                         call color ( 'RED' )
00592                         call linWid ( 5 )
00593                         call curve ( rTrack(1:stepCnt-1), zTrack(1:stepCnt-1), stepCnt-1 )
00594                         if ( NFO ) then 
00595                             call color ( 'GREEN' )
00596                             call curve ( rTrack_nfo(1:stepCnt-1), zTrack_nfo(1:stepCnt-1), stepCnt-1 )
00597                         endif
00598                         call linWid ( 1 )
00599                         call endGrf ()
00600                         call axsPos ( 300, 2600 )
00601                         call axsLen ( 1500, 700 )
00602                         call graf ( start_R-0.01, start_R+0.01, start_R-0.01,&
00603                             0.005, start_z-0.01, start_z+0.01,start_z-0.01, 0.005 ) 
00604                         call color ( 'RED' )
00605                         call curve ( rTrack(1:stepCnt-1), zTrack(1:stepCnt-1), stepCnt-1 )
00606                         call endGrf ()
00607 
00608                     end if
00609 
00610                 endif
00611             end if
00612 #endif
00613  
00614                
00615         end do
00616 
00617         !call disFin ()
00618  
00619        
00620 11      continue
00621 
00622         !   Introduce a stride over which to select points out
00623         !   of a track since we need a higher resolution track for
00624         !   tracing than we do for bounce averaging. Remember to 
00625         !   shorten the tau by the same factor.
00626 
00627         stride  = int ( stepCnt / usePtsPerTrack )
00628         if ( stride < 1 ) stride = 1
00629         if ( noAveraging ) stride = 1
00630         
00631         tau = tau / stride
00632 
00633         !   Calculate f_rzvv indices and add this orbit
00634         !   to the f_rzvv particle count. At this point the
00635         !   f_rzvv function will only be the number of particles
00636         !   but since its a regular grid we can divide by the
00637         !   volume element after counting all the particles ;-)
00638 
00639         if ( NFO ) then
00640 
00641             !   Overwrite tracks with NFO versions
00642 
00643             rTrack  = rTrack_nfo
00644             zTrack  = ztrack_nfo
00645             vPerpTrack  = vPerpTrack_nfo
00646             vParTrack   = vParTrack_nfo
00647 
00648         endif
00649 
00650         if ( stillIn ) then 
00651         
00652             R_index = ( rTrack - rLeft ) / R_range * R_nBins + 1
00653             !z_index = ( zTrack + z_range ) / ( 2.0 * z_range ) * z_nBins + 1
00654             z_index = ( zTrack - z_min ) / z_range * z_nBins + 1
00655             vPerp_index = vPerpTrack / vPerp_range * vPerp_nBins + 1
00656             vPar_index  = ( vParTrack + vPar_range ) / ( 2.0 * vPar_range ) &
00657                 * vPar_nBins + 1
00658 
00659             if ( .not. gParticle ) then
00660 
00661                 do i=1,stepCnt
00662                     
00663                     if ( int(R_index(i)) <= R_nBins .and. int(R_index(i)) >= 1 .and. &
00664                         int(z_index(i)) <= z_nBins .and. int(z_index(i)) >= 1 .and. &
00665                         int(vPerp_index(i)) <= vPerp_nBins .and. int(vPerp_index(i)) >= 1 .and. &
00666                         int(vPar_index(i)) <= vPar_nBins .and. int(vPar_index(i)) >= 1 ) then 
00667 
00668                         !dV_ = vPerpTrack(i) * rTrack(i) * &
00669                         !    4.0 * pi**2 * R_binSize * z_binSize * &
00670                         !    vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize  
00671                         dV_ = vPerp_binCenters(int(vPerp_index(i))) * rTrack(i) * &
00672                             4.0 * pi**2 * R_binSize * z_binSize * &
00673                             vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize  
00674                    
00675                         f_rzvv(int(R_index(i)),int(z_index(i)), &
00676                                int(vPerp_index(i)),int(vPar_index(i))) &
00677                            = f_rzvv(int(R_index(i)),int(z_index(i)), &
00678                                int(vPerp_index(i)),int(vPar_index(i))) + dtArray(i) / tau * weightMod / dV_
00679                     
00680                     else
00681                 
00682                         nP_off_vGrid    = nP_off_vGrid + dtArray(i) / tau
00683 
00684                     end if
00685                 
00686                 end do
00687 
00688             else
00689 
00690                 !   Try adding a particle of some finite size 
00691                 !   described by a gaussian in 4D space
00692     
00693                 v_sigma = particleSize * c
00694                 
00695                 !   Loop only over a few cells around the particle location, 
00696                 !   otherwise this is prohibitavely slow. Its already a factor
00697                 !   of 10 slower than using the delta functions above :-(
00698     
00699                 vPerp_start = int(vPerp_index)-sR
00700                 where (vPerp_start < 1) vPerp_start = 1
00701                 vPerp_stop  = int(vPerp_index)+sR
00702                 where (vPerp_stop > vPerp_nBins) vPerp_stop = vPerp_nBins
00703      
00704                 vPar_start = int(vPar_index)-sR
00705                 where (vPar_start < 1) vPar_start = 1
00706                 vPar_stop  = int(vPar_index)+sR
00707                 where (vPar_stop > vPar_nBins) vPar_stop = vPar_nBins
00708      
00709                 R_start = int(R_index)!-sR
00710                 where (R_start < 1) R_start = 1
00711                 R_stop  = int(R_index)!+sR
00712                 where (R_stop > R_nBins) R_stop = R_nBins
00713      
00714                 z_start = int(z_index)!-sR
00715                 where (z_start < 1) z_start = 1
00716                 z_stop  = int(z_index)!+sR
00717                 where (z_stop > z_nBins) z_stop = z_nBins
00718 
00719 
00720                 !   Calculate normFac for full particle size,
00721                 !   No bessel function required here since the
00722                 !   vPer offset = 0, i.e., besselI(0,0,)=1.0
00723   
00724                 f_rzvv_update = 0.0 
00725                 do i=1,vPerp_nBins
00726                     do j=1,vPar_nBins
00727                     
00728                         f_rzvv_update(i,j) =  exp ( &
00729                                 - ( vPerp_binCenters(i)**2  &
00730                                 + vPar_binCenters(j)**2 ) &
00731                                 / ( 2.0 * v_sigma**2 ) &
00732                                 ) * 2.0 * pi  
00733                                 
00734   
00735                         dV(i,j) = vPerp_binCenters(i) * &
00736                             4.0 * pi**2 * R_binSize * z_binSize * &
00737                             vPerp_binSize * vPar_binSize  
00738                     end do
00739                 end do
00740             
00741                 normFac_ = sum ( f_rzvv_update * dV )  
00742 
00743                 !   Setup the base phi grid in case the 
00744                 !   uPer offset is too large for the bessel
00745                 !   function.
00746 
00747                 phiBase = (/ (i*1.0,i=-10,10,1) /) / 10.0
00748  
00749                 do ii=1,stepCnt,stride          
00750 
00751                 normFac = normFac_ * rTrack(ii) 
00752    
00753                 f_rzvv_update = 0.0
00754                 f_rzvv_update2 = 0.0
00755 
00756                 do i=vPerp_start(ii),vPerp_stop(ii)
00757                     do j=vPar_start(ii),vPar_stop(ii)
00758 
00759                         !   If we end up with Infinity type nonsense poping up
00760                         !   in the distribution function I would suggest
00761                         !   altering this step so it does not consider particles
00762                         !   located outside the chosen vPer/vPar range.
00763  
00764                         bArg    =  vPerpTrack(ii) * vPerp_binCenters(i) / v_sigma**2
00765 
00766                         if ( bArg < 650 ) then
00767 
00768                             bF = bessI ( 0, real(bArg,dbl) )
00769                        
00770                             expTerm_D   = exp ( real ( &
00771                                     - ( vPerpTrack(ii)**2 + ( vParTrack(ii) - vPar_binCenters(j) )**2  &
00772                                     + vPerp_binCenters(i)**2 ) &
00773                                     / ( 2.0 * v_sigma**2 ) &
00774                                     , dbl ) ) 
00775                             result_D    = expTerm_D * bF * 2d0 * real(pi,dbl)
00776                             f_rzvv_update(i,j)  = result_D
00777 
00778                             !   This is a catch for when the modified bessel
00779                             !   function returns +Infinity
00780 
00781                             if ( bF > 1d300 ) then
00782                               
00783                                 f_rzvv_update(i,j)  = 0.0 
00784  
00785                             end if
00786 
00787                         else    ! do the gyro angle integral the old fashioned way
00788 
00789                             !   but use an adaptive range for the phi
00790                             !   integral depending on the value of vPerpTrack.
00791                             !   Oh yes, this is brilliant!
00792 
00793                             phiRange    = 2.5 * v_sigma / vPerpTrack(ii)     
00794                             !phiRange    = 2.5 * v_sigma / vPerp_binCenters(int(vPerp_index(ii)))
00795                             phi = phiBase * phiRange
00796                             phi0    = 0.0
00797 
00798                             vX  = vPerp_binCenters(i) * cos ( phi )
00799                             vY  = vPerp_binCenters(i) * sin ( phi )
00800                             vZ  = vPar_binCenters(j)
00801 
00802                             vX0 = vPerpTrack(ii) * cos ( phi0 )
00803                             vY0 = vPerpTrack(ii) * sin ( phi0 )
00804                             vZ0 = vParTrack(ii)
00805 
00806                             f_rzvv_update(i,j)   = sum ( &
00807                                 exp ( -1.0 * &
00808                                       ( ( vX - vX0 )**2 + ( vY - vY0 )**2 + ( vZ - vZ0 )**2 ) & 
00809                                             / ( 2.0 * v_sigma**2 ) ) &
00810                                 ) * abs ( phi(1) - phi(2) )
00811 
00812                         end if
00813  
00814                     end do
00815                 end do
00816                
00817                 !   Normalise and add
00818 
00819                 if ( normFac == 0 .or. tau == 0 ) then
00820                 
00821                     write (*,*) 'DLG: ERROR, normFac == 0 or tau == 0 '
00822                     write (*,*) normFac, tau, minVal ( dV ), maxVal ( dV ), &
00823                         minVal ( f_rzvv_update ), maxVal ( f_rzvv_update ), &
00824                         rTrack (ii), ii, stepCnt, sum ( f_rzvv_update )
00825 
00826                 else
00827 
00828                     f_rzvv_update   = f_rzvv_update / normFac * weightMod
00829 
00830                     f_rzvv(R_start(ii),z_start(ii),vPerp_start(ii):vPerp_stop(ii),vPar_start(ii):vPar_stop(ii))  = &
00831                         f_rzvv(R_start(ii),z_start(ii),vPerp_start(ii):vPerp_stop(ii),vPar_start(ii):vPar_stop(ii)) &
00832                         + dtArray(ii) / tau &
00833                         * f_rzvv_update(vPerp_start(ii):vPerp_stop(ii),vPar_start(ii):vPar_stop(ii)) 
00834 
00835                 endif 
00836 
00837                 end do 
00838 
00839             end if    
00840         
00841         end if
00842 
00843     end subroutine gc_orbit 
00844 
00845 end module gc_integrate
